    • Method Detail

      • createBugReport

        public BugReport createBugReport(java.lang.String title,
                                 java.lang.String description,
                                 Issuer creator,
                                 SubSystem subSystem)
                          throws ModelException
        Function to create a new BugReport and add the bugreport to the list of bugreports.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the bugreport
        description - The description of the bugreport
        creator - The creator of the bugreport
        subSystem - The subsystem of the bugreport
        Returns:
        The newly created bugreport
        Throws:
        ModelException - the title or description is empty.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the creator or subsystem is null.

      • createBugReport

        public BugReport createBugReport(java.lang.String title,
                                 java.lang.String description,
                                 Issuer creator,
                                 SubSystem subSystem,
                                 TheDate creationDate,
                                 Tag tag,
                                 java.util.List<Developer> initialAssignees)
                          throws ModelException
        Function to create a new BugReport and add the bugreport to the list of bugreports. Van de gebruiker van deze functie wordt verwacht dat de initialAssignies ook developers van het project zijn. Anders zullen tag assignment rechten voor deze gebruiker geweigerd worden.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the bugreport
        description - The description of the bugreport
        creator - The creator of the bugreport
        subSystem - The subsystem of the bugreport
        creationDate - The creation date of the bugreport
        tag - The initial tag of the bugreport
        initialAssignees - The list of initialAssignies van de bugreport
        Returns:
        The newly created bugreport
        Throws:
        ModelException - the given title of description is empty.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The subsystem, creator, creationdata or tag is null.
